vote.title: Consideration of appointment to the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Board of Directors for Positions 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, one of whom shall be appointed as a shared member with the City of Cockrell Hill.  (Closed Session, if necessary, Personnel, Sec. 551.074, T. O. M. A.) (Name of nominee in the City Secretary’s Office) - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
